violations.message:
missing-contraction: "By using PrepFlow, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance
                with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not
                use our service." - Consider using "don't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may
                share your information only in the following circumstances:" - Consider using "don't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "PrepFlow is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not
                knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have
                collected information from a child, please contact us immediately." - Consider using "don't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "By accessing and using PrepFlow ("the Service"), you accept and agree to
                be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide
                by the above, please do not use this service." - Consider using "don't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "The Service is designed to assist restaurant owners, managers, and chefs in making
                informed business decisions. However, we do not guarantee specific financial
                outcomes. Feature availability may vary based on your subscription tier." - Consider using "don't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "Your subscription will automatically renew each
                month unless you cancel before the end of your current billing period. You will be
                charged the then-current monthly subscription fee on each renewal date." - Consider using "you'll" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "You may cancel your subscription at any
                time through your account settings or by contacting us. Your subscription will
                remain active until the end of your current billing period, after which your access
                will be terminated. Cancellation does not entitle you to a refund for any unused
                portion of your current billing period." - Consider using "doesn't" instead
violations.reference: See .cursor/rules/dialogs.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines) and development.mdc (PrepFlow Voice Guidelines). Use contractions, kitchen metaphors, and avoid technical jargon.

violations.message:
missing-contraction: "All subscription fees are non-refundable. We do not
                provide refunds or credits for partial months of service, unused subscription

development.mdc#eslint-configuration.message:
ESLint: Error: Cannot create components during render

Components created during render will reset their state each time they are created. Declare components outside of render.

  29 |     <html>
  30 |       <body>
> 31 |         <ErrorComponent />
     |          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ This component is created during render
  32 |       </body>
  33 |     </html>
  34 |   );

/Users/danielkuschmierz/prepflow-landing/app/global-error.tsx:14:26
  12 | export default function GlobalError({ error, reset }: GlobalErrorProps) {
  13 |   const pathname = usePathname();
> 14 |   const ErrorComponent = useErrorMessageSelector();
     |                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The component is created during render here
  15 |
  16 |   if (
